options.text: Force her to sign it over

options.text: To become a true brave warrior of the sea

options.text: Food for 100 men and his ship

options.text: A trap in the dining hall

options.text: To never lose again until he beats Mihawk

options.text: I await you at the top.

options.text: The water pressure affecting his kicks

options.text: A map of the East Blue

He threw it into the air to see if it would cut his arm
He slept with it under his pillow

options.text: The annual East Blue Cooking Contest

options.text: Iron Mace Alvida (after eating a Devil Fruit)

options.text: A bolt of lightning struck the platform

To request a fleet for backup

options.text: He's too weak for the Grand Line.
The D. will always call up a storm.

options.text: To be captain of his own crew
To find the One Piece first
To become a brave warrior of the sea

options.text: A man-made structure on its snout

To return for a rematch after conquering the Grand Line

options.text: Their Log Pose wasn't set yet

While Luffy was recovering, the rest of the Straw Hats, along with Vivi, rushed towards which city, the capital of Alabasta, to stop the war?
Which of Alabasta's two head guards, known as 'The Falcon' and a Zoan Devil Fruit user, sacrificed himself to try and stop Crocodile's bomb plot?
What type of Zoan Devil Fruit did Pell, Alabasta's guardian, consume, allowing him to transform into a giant falcon?

options.text: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Eagle
Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon
Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix

props.questionText: What deceptive tactic did Mr. 2 Bon Klay use, impersonating King Cobra, to incite the Rebel Army to attack the Royal Palace?

options.text: He ordered the Royal Army to attack the rebels first
He publicly admitted to stealing the rain
He set fire to a rebel camp
He announced a new tax on the poor

props.questionText: How did the Straw Hats plan to identify and stop the Baroque Works agents hidden amongst the battling armies in Alubarna?

options.text: By looking for their codename tattoos
By using Usopp's goggles to spot them
By each taking on a numbered agent based on clues from Vivi
By waiting for them to reveal themselves

props.questionText: Which of the Straw Hats faced off against Mr. 4 and his dog-cannon Lassoo, and his partner Miss Merry Christmas?
What Devil Fruit did Miss Merry Christmas consume, allowing her to transform into a mole and dig underground?
What unusual weapon did Mr. 4 wield in battle, a four-ton baseball bat?
Lassoo, Mr. 4's 'dog-gun', was originally a gun that 'ate' which Zoan Devil Fruit?

options.text: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Chihuahua
Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund (Basset Hound)
Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard
Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Cobra

props.questionText: How did Usopp and Chopper cleverly combine their abilities to defeat the Mr. 4 pair?

options.text: Chopper distracted them while Usopp sniped
Usopp used Chopper's Horn Point to hit Mr. 4 with his own bat
Chopper dug a hole that Mr. 4 fell into
They tricked Lassoo into exploding near them

props.questionText: Which Straw Hat faced off against Mr. 1 (Daz Bonez), whose body was made of blades, and his partner Miss Doublefinger, who could grow needles?

options.text: Zoro (vs Mr. 1) and Nami (vs Miss Doublefinger)

props.questionText: What is the name of Mr. 1's Devil Fruit, allowing him to turn any part of his body into sharp steel blades?
What is the name of Miss Doublefinger's Devil Fruit, allowing her to sprout sharp spikes and needles from her body?
What new weapon, created by Usopp, did Nami use in her fight against Miss Doublefinger, allowing her to create weather phenomena?
How did Nami eventually defeat Miss Doublefinger, using a combination of her Clima-Tact's heat, cool, and thunder balls?

options.text: She electrocuted her with a powerful thunderbolt
She trapped her in a cyclone
She created a mirage and tricked her
She used a fog bank to escape

props.questionText: During his brutal battle with Mr. 1 (Daz Bonez), what critical understanding did Zoro achieve that allowed him to finally cut steel?

options.text: He learned to use Haki unconsciously
He found a flaw in Mr. 1's blades
He coated his swords in water

props.questionText: What was the name of Zoro's powerful finishing move against Mr. 1, a one-sword style attack that cut through his steel body?
Which Straw Hat member had a fierce kicking duel against Mr. 2 Bon Klay in the streets of Alubarna?
How did Sanji manage to identify the real Mr. 2 Bon Klay when he transformed into Nami during their fight?

options.text: Mr. 2 didn't know Nami's fighting style
Sanji noticed a flaw in the transformation (e.g., wrong tattoo)

props.questionText: What was the name of Sanji's finishing kick sequence against Mr. 2 Bon Klay, referencing a full-course meal?
Where was the massive bomb, planted by Baroque Works to annihilate both armies and the city, hidden in Alubarna's central plaza?
Who was desperately trying to reach the clock tower to disarm the bomb before it exploded, pursued by Crocodile?
What heroic, and seemingly final, act did Pell the Falcon perform to save Alubarna from the plaza bomb?

options.text: He dismantled the bomb with his talons
He carried the massive bomb high into the sky before it detonated
He created a powerful updraft to deflect the explosion
He used his body to shield the plaza

props.questionText: After being defeated once by Crocodile, how did Luffy find his way back to Alubarna for a rematch?

options.text: He followed the sound of the battle
He drank a lot of water given by an old man and tracked Crocodile
Ace returned and showed him the way

props.questionText: What crucial weakness of Crocodile did Luffy exploit in their second and third battles by using water (and later his own blood)?

options.text: Water solidifies Crocodile's sand body, making him vulnerable to physical hits
Water washes away his Logia defenses

props.questionText: Where did Luffy and Crocodile's final, climactic battle take place, deep beneath Alabasta's capital?

options.text: In the underground royal tomb / Poneglyph chamber

props.questionText: What was Crocodile's backup plan in case he was defeated, involving a timed explosion within the royal tomb?

options.text: To flood the tomb with sand
To destroy the Poneglyph and bury everyone alive

props.questionText: What new Gum-Gum technique, involving rapidly pumping his blood, did Luffy use to overcome Crocodile's poison hook in their final fight?

options.text: Gear Second (though not named yet, the principle was there)

props.questionText: How did Luffy manage to send Crocodile flying up through bedrock and out of the royal tomb, finally defeating him?

options.text: With repeated Gum-Gum Gatling punches upwards
By inflating himself and exploding upwards

props.questionText: What miraculous event occurred across Alabasta almost immediately after Crocodile's defeat, ending the long drought?

options.text: The rivers began to flow again

props.questionText: After Crocodile's defeat, who took responsibility for the entire Alabasta incident to protect the reputation of the World Government and Marines?
What significant injury did King Nefeltari Cobra sustain during his confrontation with Crocodile?

options.text: He was blinded in one eye
He was impaled by Crocodile's hook

props.questionText: Who was revealed to have survived the massive explosion by carrying the bomb into the sky, much to everyone's relief?
What difficult choice did Princess Vivi have to make regarding rejoining the Straw Hat Pirates or staying to rebuild Alabasta?

options.text: She immediately chose to leave with them
She had to decide by a certain time if she would meet them
Luffy made the decision for her

props.questionText: What clandestine gesture did the Straw Hat Pirates make towards Vivi as they departed Alabasta, signifying their enduring friendship without implicating her?

options.text: They fired a cannon in salute
They all revealed the 'X' mark on their arms
They left her a large pile of treasure

props.questionText: Who unexpectedly stowed away on the Going Merry as the Straw Hats departed from Alabasta, wishing to join their crew?
What was Nico Robin's stated reason for wanting to join the Straw Hat Pirates after Crocodile's defeat?

options.text: She had nowhere else to go and Luffy made her live
She wanted to find the One Piece
She was ordered to by a mysterious figure

props.questionText: Which crew member was initially the most vehemently opposed to Nico Robin joining the Straw Hat crew?
How did Nico Robin eventually win over most of the initially hesitant Straw Hat crew members?

options.text: By cooking them a delicious meal
By offering them treasure and valuable information
By saving them from a Marine attack
Luffy simply decided she could join, and Sanji was charmed

props.questionText: What is Nico Robin's profession and ultimate lifelong dream, which aligns with her ability to read Poneglyphs?

options.text: Archaeologist, to find the Rio Poneglyph and learn the True History
Shipwright, to build the Pirate King's ship

props.questionText: After escaping Alabasta, the Straw Hats' bounties were updated. What was Luffy's new bounty amount?
Which other Straw Hat member received his first official bounty after the events in Alabasta?
What was Roronoa Zoro's first bounty amount after his exploits in Alabasta became known?
The World Government attempted to cover up Crocodile's defeat by whom, instead crediting a Marine Captain?
What did Mr. 2 Bon Klay and his Okama crew do to help the Straw Hats escape the Marine blockade surrounding Alabasta?

options.text: They created a diversion by attacking the Marine ships
They disguised their ship as the Going Merry, leading the Marines away
They used their Okama Kenpo to fight off the Marines directly
They offered the Straw Hats a faster ship
